title: How do I make diana go 0/6 in lane, then one shots everyone on my team?
body: Why does she do so much fucking damage when she is that far behind? Can someone please explain this to me? What the fuck is that champion and why is she allowed to do that?

replies.body:
It's because shes broken trash with an outdated kit just like Akali.

She'll get reworked eventually.

I havent seen that happen. Although with all champions if you know there combos very well you can pull off some good stuff to do a lot of damage with little or no items. also team may not itemize correctly.

https://image.prntscr.com/image/0T5s8SJQRLeWfN82LipzyA.png

All her deaths in lane, then doesn't die at all then further on carries the game.
I mean, it could also be she got kills because you all misplayed. I don't think Diana is broken at all.

Making someone do poorly in lane =/= useless all game. Diana has really high ap ratios, if she finishes an item or two she will hurt with electrocute, considering it's basically an extra passive dmg ability.

Diana doesn't play well from behind. Unless the adc / support / low resist targets are at less than 3/4 health she isn't going to do enough damage to kill them, and will kill herself in an all in. You need to respect her burst damage, as you would any other assassin or burst mage. You probably made poor choices to close the game out which led to her turtling back.

Was there any mr itemized against her, after she started to bring in kills, zhonyas?
I can't find this game in your match history, so if you'd link it i'd be happy to review the kill timestamps to see what happened possibly.
